title: Spring greens with sweet chilli cod

ingredients.item: 1 pack Waitrose Skinless & Boneless Cod Fillets

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6.
Place the cod on a baking tray, sprinkle with sesame seeds and bake for 15 minutes or until just cooked throughout.
Meanwhile, heat the oil in a large frying pan, add the spring greens, kale and fennel, cover and fry for 5 minutes. Add the spinach and cook until wilted, season.
Serve the cod on top of the greens drizzled with the sweet chilli sauce.
